title: Top/Supp LF ranked team
body:
I'm a mature player with plenty of Top lane experience and a fair bit of Jungle experience. I am currently working towards becoming a support main. As a whole I feel that I have quite an edge when it comes strategy not only for myself at a given situation, but for the whole team.

Looking for a team that is willing to work hard at building synergy. I currently am gold 5 though I do not play much Solo Q. I tend to avoid it as i'm generally a chilled out person but SoloQ gets me going in all the wrong ways. However these traits don't follow me when i'm playing in a pre made group. 

This all being said, if there's an ADC out there that wants to mess around give me a yell! I'd be happy to play a few games. 

IGN: Ironbox

replies.body: i was gold 5 last year and am a adc main.. this year im still only in bronze because promo logic.but im happy to join any team u find or just have some fun duo games ... send me friend request if interested :)
